title: Failed to install - No such file or directory: 'llvm-config': 'llvm-config'
body:
Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS

command:

pip3 install shap==0.35.0


Generated the following error:

Collecting shap==0.36.0
Collecting tqdm>4.25.0 (from shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/12/cd/2dc00ab02b89727062697e0851b512664c851f77b4f272b74489d82d9d37/tqdm-4.50.1-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Collecting pandas (from shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/25/47/22fc373440e144e2111363adaa07abb09ec1f03fbc071b6d9fc0bbf65f68/pandas-1.1.3-cp37-cp37m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
Collecting slicer (from shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/46/cf/f37ac7f61214ed044b0df91252ab19376de5587926c5b572f060eb7bf257/slicer-0.0.4-py3-none-any.whl
Collecting numpy (from shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/d6/2e/a2dbcff6f46bb65645d18538d67183a1cf56b006ba96a12575c282a976bc/numpy-1.19.2-cp37-cp37m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
Collecting numba (from shap==0.36.0)
Collecting scipy (from shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/65/f9/f7a7e5009711579c72da2725174825e5056741bf4001815d097eef1b2e17/scipy-1.5.2-cp37-cp37m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
Collecting scikit-learn (from shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/f4/cb/64623369f348e9bfb29ff898a57ac7c91ed4921f228e9726546614d63ccb/scikit_learn-0.23.2-cp37-cp37m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
Collecting python-dateutil>=2.7.3 (from pandas->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/d4/70/d60450c3dd48ef87586924207ae8907090de0b306af2bce5d134d78615cb/python_dateutil-2.8.1-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Collecting pytz>=2017.2 (from pandas->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/4f/a4/879454d49688e2fad93e59d7d4efda580b783c745fd2ec2a3adf87b0808d/pytz-2020.1-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Collecting llvmlite<0.35,>=0.34.0.dev0 (from numba->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/0b/96/07bfa93a103fb9e3e9ae7f9f7c6687ae714aee66b6f3000da3fad71e0aa2/llvmlite-0.34.0.tar.gz
Collecting setuptools (from numba->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/44/a6/7fb6e8b3f4a6051e72e4e2218889351f0ee484b9ee17e995f5ccff780300/setuptools-50.3.0-py3-none-any.whl
Collecting threadpoolctl>=2.0.0 (from scikit-learn->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/f7/12/ec3f2e203afa394a149911729357aa48affc59c20e2c1c8297a60f33f133/threadpoolctl-2.1.0-py3-none-any.whl
Collecting joblib>=0.11 (from scikit-learn->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/fc/c9/f58220ac44a1592f79a343caba12f6837f9e0c04c196176a3d66338e1ea8/joblib-0.17.0-py3-none-any.whl
Collecting six>=1.5 (from python-dateutil>=2.7.3->pandas->shap==0.36.0)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/ee/ff/48bde5c0f013094d729fe4b0316ba2a24774b3ff1c52d924a8a4cb04078a/six-1.15.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Building wheels for collected packages: llvmlite
  Running setup.py bdist_wheel for llvmlite ... error
  Complete output from command /usr/bin/python3 -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" bdist_wheel -d /tmp/tmp4sxbxz2upip-wheel- --python-tag cp37:
  running bdist_wheel
  /usr/bin/python3 /tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py
  LLVM version... Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 105, in main_posix
      out = subprocess.check_output([llvm_config, '--version'])
    File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 411, in check_output
      **kwargs).stdout
    File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 488, in run
      with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as process:
    File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 800, in __init__
      restore_signals, start_new_session)
    File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 1551, in _execute_child
      raise child_exception_type(errno_num, err_msg, err_filename)
  FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'llvm-config': 'llvm-config'
  
  During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
  
  Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 191, in <module>
      main()
    File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 181, in main
      main_posix('linux', '.so')
    File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 108, in main_posix
      "to the path for llvm-config" % (llvm_config,))
  RuntimeError: llvm-config failed executing, please point LLVM_CONFIG to the path for llvm-config
  error: command '/usr/bin/python3' failed with exit status 1
  
  ----------------------------------------
  Failed building wheel for llvmlite
  Running setup.py clean for llvmlite
Failed to build llvmlite
Installing collected packages: tqdm, numpy, six, python-dateutil, pytz, pandas, slicer, llvmlite, setuptools, numba, scipy, threadpoolctl, joblib, scikit-learn, shap
  Running setup.py install for llvmlite ... error
    Complete output from command /usr/bin/python3 -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-kzebh0ji-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile --user --prefix=:
    running install
    running build
    got version from file /tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/llvmlite/_version.py {'version': '0.34.0', 'full': 'c5889c9e98c6b19d5d85ebdd982d64a03931f8e2'}
    running build_ext
    /usr/bin/python3 /tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py
    LLVM version... Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 105, in main_posix
        out = subprocess.check_output([llvm_config, '--version'])
      File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 411, in check_output
        **kwargs).stdout
      File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 488, in run
        with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as process:
      File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 800, in __init__
        restore_signals, start_new_session)
      File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 1551, in _execute_child
        raise child_exception_type(errno_num, err_msg, err_filename)
    FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'llvm-config': 'llvm-config'
    
    During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
    
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 191, in <module>
        main()
      File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 181, in main
        main_posix('linux', '.so')
      File "/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 108, in main_posix
        "to the path for llvm-config" % (llvm_config,))
    RuntimeError: llvm-config failed executing, please point LLVM_CONFIG to the path for llvm-config
    error: command '/usr/bin/python3' failed with exit status 1
    
    ----------------------------------------
Command "/usr/bin/python3 -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-kzebh0ji-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile --user --prefix=" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-build-h3jrtq3y/llvmlite/

-------------------------------------------------------------

For now my solution was to install a previous version  pip3 install shap==0.35.0.
